metadata.min_stack_comments: New fields added: required_fields, related_integrations, setup

author: Elastic
rule.description:
Identifies a high number (20) of macOS SSH KeyGen process executions from the same host. An adversary may attempt a
brute force attack to obtain unauthorized access to user accounts.
rule.name: Potential macOS SSH Brute Force Detected
rule.query: event.category:process and host.os.type:macos and event.type:start and process.name:"sshd-keygen-wrapper" and process.parent.name:launchd
